value.description: A copy has been placed into a regulated state multiple times.
value.scriptOption: event1 = repeatedError (4133, 3, 90, 0, "system") event2 = repeatedError (4133, 2, 720, 0, "copy") if (event1 ~= nill) then event1:callHome(1,"Recurring system error: Event 4133 [The system has detected an unstable state in this copy and therefore, the copy is being regulated for a period of x minutes, in order to allow for the environment to stabilize.] was logged three times in 90 minutes.", 48, "copy") elseif (event2 ~= nill) then event2:callHome(1,"Recurring copy error: Event 4133 [The system has detected an unstable state in this copy and therefore, the copy is being regulated for a period of x minutes, in order to allow for the environment to stabilize.] was logged two times in 12 hours.", 48, "copy") end

value.description: Bad volume sectors have been detected.
value.scriptOption: event = singleError(12040) if (event ~= nill) then event:callHome(2,"Error: Event 12040 [System has detected bad sectors in volume.] was logged.", 72, "copy") end

value.description: A datapath connectivity issue has prevented RPAs at one site from transferring replicated data to the other site, multiple times.
value.scriptOption: event1 = errorWithoutFix (12004, 14004, 90, "system") event2 = repeatedErrorAndFix (12004, 14004, 1, 90, 90, "system") if (event1 ~= nill) then event1:callHome (1, "System error without fix: Although event 12004 [Error in data link -- all RPAs at a site are unable to transfer replicated data to other site.] was logged, event 14004 [Data link restored -- all RPAs able to transfer replicated data to other site.] was not logged, within 90 minutes of the first event.", 24, "site") elseif (event2 ~= nill) then event2:callHome (2, "Recurring system error and fix: Events 12004 [Error in data link -- all RPAs at a site are unable to transfer replicated data to other site.] and 14004 [Data link restored -- all RPAs able to transfer replicated data to other site.] were logged one time in 90 minutes.", 48, "site") end

value.description: A Fibre Channel connectivity issue has been detected multiple times between all RPAs, storage and splitters.
value.scriptOption: event1 = errorWithoutFix(12014, 14014, 180, "system") event2 = repeatedErrorAndFix(12014, 14014, 3, 90, 180, "system") if (event1 ~= nill) then event1:callHome(1, "System error without fix: Although event 12014 [Fibre Channel link between all RPAs and all splitters and storage is down.] was logged, event 14014 [Fibre Channel link between all RPAs and all splitters and storage is restored.] was not logged, within 3 hours of the first event.", 24, "site") elseif (event2 ~= nill) then event2:callHome(2, "Recurring system error and fix: Events 12014 [Fibre Channel link between all RPAs and all splitters and storage is down.] and 14014 [Fibre Channel link between all RPAs and all splitters and storage is restored.] were logged three times in 90 minutes.", 24, "site") end

value.description: One or more host-based splitters have been down multiple times.
value.scriptOption: event1 = repeatedErrorAndFix (5013, 5015, 10, 7200, 60, "splitter") event2 = repeatedError(5013, 15, 7200, 0, "system") if (event2 ~= nill) then event2:callHome (1, "Recurring system error: Event 5013 [Splitter is down.] was logged 15 times in 5 days.", 24, "splitter") elseif (event1 ~= nill) then event1:callHome (2, "Recurring host-based splitter error and fix: Events 5013 [Splitter is down.] and 5015 [Splitter is up.] were logged 10 times in 5 days.", 24, "splitter") end

value.description: All journal volumes attached to the consistency group (or groups) are not accessible.
value.scriptOption: event1 = repeatedErrorAndFix (12038, 14038, 5, 7200, 0, "system") event2 = errorWithoutFix(12038, 14038, 180, "system") if (event1~=nill) then event1:callHome (1, "Recurring system error and fix: Events 12038 [All journal volumes attached to the consistency group (or groups) are not accessible.] and 14038 [Access to all journal volumes attached to the consistency group (or groups) is restored.] were logged 5 times in 5 days.", 48, "site") elseif (event2 ~= nill) then event2:callHome(2, "Inaccessible journal volumes without fix: Although event 12038 [All journal volumes attached to the consistency group (or groups) are not accessible.] was logged, event 14038 [Access to all journal volumes attached to the consistency group (or groups) is restored.] was not logged, within 3 hours of the first event.", 48, "system") end

value.description: A possible replication integrity issue has been detected when using the periodic integrity check.
value.scriptOption: event = singleError (4165) if (event ~= nill) then event:callHome (1, "Error: Event 4165 [Possible integrity issue detected.] was logged.", 24, "copy") end

value.description: One or more internal control or replication processes have restarted one or more times.
value.scriptOption: event1 = repeatedError (10206, 10, 1440, 60, "system") event2 = repeatedError (10207, 10, 1440, 60, "system") event3 = repeatedError (10206, 10, 1440, 0, "system") event4 = repeatedError (10207, 10, 1440, 0, "system") if (event1 ~= nill and event2 ~= nill) then event1:callHome (1, "Recurring system errors: Events 10206 [Internal control process was restarted.] and 10207 [Internal replication process was restarted.] have each been logged 10 times in 1440 minutes.", 24, "RPA") elseif (event1 ~= nill) then event1:callHome(2, "Recurring system error: Event 10206 [Internal control process was restarted.] was logged 10 times in 1440 minutes.", 48, "RPA") elseif (event2 ~= nill) then event2:callHome(2, "Recurring system error: Event 10207 [Internal replication process was restarted.] was logged 10 times in 1440 minutes.", 48, "RPA") elseif (event3 ~= nill) then event3:callHome (1, "Recurring system error: Event 10206 [Internal control process was restarted.] was logged 10 times in 1440 minutes.", 24, "RPA") elseif (event4 ~= nill) then event4:callHome (1, "Recurring system error: Event 10207 [Internal replication process was restarted.] was logged 10 times in 1440 minutes.", 24, "RPA") end

value.description: A corrupted journal has been detected.
value.scriptOption: event = singleError (12010) if (event ~= nill) then event:callHome (1, "Error: Event 12010 [Journal error -- full sweep to be performed after error is corrected.] was logged.", 24, "copy") end

value.description: An RPA NIC issue has been detected multiple times.
value.scriptOption: event = errorWithoutFix (12047, 14047, 180, "RPA") clusterSize = systemSettings:clusterSize() if (event ~= nill and clusterSize>2) then event:callHome (3, "RPA error without fix when cluster size is greater than two: Although event 12047 [RPA network interface card (NIC) problem.] was logged, event 14047 [RPA network interface card (NIC) problem corrected.] was not logged, within 3 hours of the first event.", 48, "RPA") elseif (event ~= nill) then event:callHome (2, "RPA error without fix: Although event 12047 [RPA network interface card (NIC) problem.] was logged, event 14047 [RPA network interface card (NIC) problem corrected.] was not logged, within 3 hours of the first event.", 24, "RPA") end

event1 = repeatedError (10203, 3, 60, 0,"system") if (event1 ~= nill) then event1:callHome (2, "Recurring system error: Event 10203 [RPA cluster was down.] was logged 4 time in 60 minutes.", 24, "site") end

value.description: System has detected that volume is read only.
value.scriptOption: event = singleError(12041) if (event ~= nill) then event:callHome(2,"Error: Event 12041 [System has detected that volume is read only.] was logged.", 72, "copy") end

value.description: One or more RPAs have not been able to access the repository volume multiple times.
value.scriptOption: event1 = errorWithoutFix (12033, 14033, 90, "site") event2 = repeatedErrorAndFix (12033, 14033, 2, 90, 90, "site") if (event1 ~= nill) then event1:callHome (1, "Site error without fix: Although event 12033 [The repository volume is not accessible; repository data may be lost.] was logged, event 14033 [Access to the repository volume is restored. Restored repository data integrity.] was not logged, within 3 hours of the first event.", 24, "site") elseif (event2 ~= nill) then event2:callHome (2, "Recurring site error and fix: Events 12033 [The repository volume is not accessible; repository data may be lost.] and 14033 [Access to the repository volume is restored. Restored repository data integrity.] were logged twice in 90 minutes.", 48, "site") end

value.description: All of the RPAs at one site have lost communication with all of the RPAs at the other site, multiple times.
value.scriptOption: event1 = repeatedErrorAndFix (12002, 14002, 6, 720, 0, "system") event2 = repeatedErrorAndFix (12002, 14002, 2, 60, 0, "system") if (event1~=nill) then event1:callHome (1, "Recurring system error and fix: Events 12002 [Error occurred in all links to the other site; the other site may be down.] and 14002 [All links to other site restored.] were logged six times in 12 hours.", 48, "site") elseif (event2~=nill) then event2:callHome (1, "Recurring system error and fix: Events 12002 [Error occurred in all links to the other site; the other site may be down.] and 14002 [All links to other site restored.] were logged two times in 1 hour.", 48, "site") end
